mapper.insert: insert into apply_resume_tb(recruitment_post_id, user_id, enterprise_id, title, content, career, education, skill, award, language, link, birthdate, address, finish, created_at) values(#{recruitmentPostId}, #{userId}, #{enterpriseId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{career}, #{education}, #{skill}, #{award}, #{language}, #{link}, #{birthdate}, #{address}, #{finish}, now())
